name: cable standing pulldown (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull the rope down towards your thighs, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the rope back up.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, with the band placed just above your knees.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, push your hips back and bend your knees to lower into a squat position.
Step:3 Make sure your knees are tracking over your toes and your weight is in your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell reverse spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: potty squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Lower your body down by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if you were sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight throughout the movement.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell wide reverse grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide reverse grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in and your wrists straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell one arm fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your upper back is resting on the exercise ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: dumbbell incline row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Grab a dumbbell in each hand and sit on the bench with your chest against the incline.
Step:3 Extend your arms fully, allowing the dumbbells to hang straight down from your shoulders.
Step:4 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell standing one arm curl (over incline bench)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing forward.
Step:2 Place your other hand on an incline bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: lying elbow to knee
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 At the same time, extend your right leg straight out and lift it off the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and extending your left leg.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable upright row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold the cable attachment with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Pull the cable attachment straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Slowly lower the cable attachment back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: intermediate hip flexor and quad stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand upright with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for support.
Step:3 Bend your right knee and bring your right foot towards your glutes, grabbing the rope with your right hand.
Step:4 Slowly pull your right foot towards your glutes, feeling a stretch in your right quad.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:6 Release the stretch and repeat on the left side.

name: lever chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause briefly at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: chest dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:3 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith chair squat
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the height of the smith machine bar to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:3 Place the barbell across your upper back, resting it on your traps.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you slowly lower your body by bending your knees and hips.
Step:5 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: one arm chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a pull-up bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Reach up and grab the bar with an underhand grip, with one hand gripping the bar and the other hand holding your wrist for support.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull yourself up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms and repeat.

name: lever hammer grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the leverage machine.
Step:2 Place your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your chest is pressed against it.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a hammer grip (palms facing each other).
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell standing alternate overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

name: overhead triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, bending at the elbow so that your hand reaches towards the opposite shoulder blade.
Step:3 With your other hand, gently pull the elbow of the extended arm towards the opposite side of your head, feeling a stretch in your triceps.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: weighted muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 As you reach the top of the movement, transition your grip so that your palms are facing towards you.
Step:4 Continue pulling yourself up until your chest reaches the bar, then pause for a moment.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lever calf press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leverage machine so that your shoulders are aligned with the lever pad.
Step:2 Place your toes on the lever pad, with your heels hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or side supports for stability.
Step:4 Push the lever pad down by extending your ankles, contracting your calf muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement.
Step:6 Slowly return to the starting position by allowing your heels to rise back up.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell alternate biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Place the arm blaster on your upper arms, ensuring a secure fit.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell up towards your shoulder while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the movement with the opposite arm.
Step:8 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted svend press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight plate in front of your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keep your elbows slightly bent and your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Press the weight plate straight out in front of you, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring the weight plate back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell squat jump step rear lunge
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Explode upwards, jumping off the ground as high as you can.
Step:4 Land softly on your feet and immediately step back with one leg into a reverse lunge.
Step:5 Lower your body down until your front thigh is parallel to the ground, keeping your back straight.
Step:6 Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the jump and lunge sequence on the other leg.
Step:8 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: close-grip push-up (on knees)
instructions: Step:1 Start by getting on your hands and knees, with your hands shoulder-width apart and your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Pause for a moment when your chest is just above the ground.
Step:4 Push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable to a low pulley and lie down facing up on a mat.
Step:2 Hold the cable with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your legs up, bringing your thighs towards your chest.
Step:4 While keeping your upper body stable, curl your pelvis up towards your chest, lifting your hips off the mat.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell one leg squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and extend it forward, keeping it parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair, keeping your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thigh is parallel to the ground, then push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

name: dumbbell one arm seated neutral wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing up.
Step:2 Rest your forearm on your thigh, allowing your wrist to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Keeping your forearm stationary, curl your wrist upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your wrist back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other hand.

name: cable pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and push the bar down until your elbows are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lean planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders past your hands.
Step:3 Keep your elbows slightly bent and your body straight as you lean forward.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in your right hand overhead.
Step:2 Rotate your left foot outwards about 45 degrees and keep your right foot pointing forward.
Step:3 Bend your torso to the left side, keeping your right arm extended overhead and your eyes on the kettlebell.
Step:4 Lower your torso as far as you can while keeping your right arm straight and your left arm extended to the side.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position by pushing through your right foot and engaging your obliques.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.
